problem_names:
lemma
  "\<exists> x. \<exists> y \<in> UNIV. (\<exists> z \<in> UNIV. x + y = (z::nat)) \<and> (\<exists> z. x + y = (z::nat))"
translations:
lemma
  "\<exists> x. \<exists> y \<in> UNIV. (\<exists> z \<in> UNIV. x + y = (z::nat)) \<and> (\<exists> z. x + y = (z::nat))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>x.
       \<exists>y\<in>UNIV.
          (\<exists>z\<in>UNIV. x + y = z) \<and> (\<exists>z. x + y = z)
